entry.title: IRC meetings moved to #bitcoin-core-dev
entry.summary: Over the past two weeks, the weekly developer meeting for Bitcoin, which usually takes place in #bitcoin-dev, was held in #bitcoin-core-dev instead. This is due to MeetingBot being deactivated in #bitcoin-dev. The meetings are held every Thursday from 19:00-20:00 UTC. Wladimir has requested that this information be left as is without further action.
